name: B cell shooter
description:
Description:
In this game you are the last surviving B cell fighting to keep your body alive. Destroy the antigens by shooting them with your antibodies. Antigens will only die if they are hit by an antibody of the same colour.

Shoot them up and see if you can beat your high score! Good luck =)

Write your high score in the comments!

Controls:
WSAD to move.
O to rotate player right.
K to rotate player left.
Space to Dash.
Esc to pause the game.
